{"city": "Antioch", "state": "CA", "name": "Community Produce Program", "address": "2335 Country Hills Dr,", "phone": "925-709-4424", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food Antioch Printer Friendly List Community Produce Program Families and individuals can pick up to 20 pounds of FREE fresh produce twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Antioch Health Center , 2335 Country Hills Dr, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Monday 10:00-11:00am.
							Please bring two bags with handles. CalFresh Office (EHSD) , 4545 Delta Fair Blvd, Antioch , 1st & 3rd Friday 11:00am-12:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Carmen Dragon Elementary School , 4721 Vista Grande Dr, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Saturday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Jubilee Christian Center , 11 Texas St, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Mahogany Way KinderCare , 2300 Mahogany Way, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Thursday 4:00-5:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Marsh Elementary School , 2304 G St, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Saturday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Mission Elementary School , 1711 Mission Dr, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 4:00-5:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Most Holy Rosary Catholic Church , 1313 A St, Antioch , 1st & 3rd Friday 1:30-2:30pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. St. Ignatius of Antioch , 3351 Contra Loma Blvd, Antioch , 1st & 3rd Friday 3:30-4:30pm.
							Park in any parking spot and walk up to the distribution. Please bring two bags with handles. Templo Santo Community Church , 201 E 18th St, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Saturday 10:00-11:00am.
							Please bring two bags with handles. The Landing Place , 620 E Tregallas Rd, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. West River Town Apartments , 811 W 4th St, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Sunday 2:30-3:30pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Mobile Pantry Distribution Families and individuals can pick up FREE fresh produce, proteins, dairy and a variety of nonperishable food once or twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Contra Costa Event Park (Fairgrounds) , 1201 W 10th St, Antioch , 1st Tuesday 10:00am-12:00pm.
							Please bring your own bags Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Agape International Church & Ministries , 605 W Madill St, Antioch , Thursday 1:00-3:00pm. Phone: 925-709-4424 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. AMF Food Closet , 2507 San Jose Dr, Antioch , Wednesday & Thursday 9:00am-12:00pm.
							Proof of address is required. Antioch residents only. Phone: 925-757-1672 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. En Su Habitacion (Drive-Thru), 2808 Harbour Dr, Antioch , Thursday 11:30am-12:30pm. Phone: 925-759-0861 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. First Family Church (Drive-Thru), 3195 Contra Loma Blvd, Antioch , Saturday 9:30-10:30am. Phone: 925-706-1238 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Genesis Church (Drive-Thru), 1800 Woodland Dr, Antioch , Saturday 9:00-10:00am. Phone: 925-418-4735 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Grace Closet , 3415 Oakley Rd, Antioch , Wednesday 4:00-6:00pm
Saturday 12:00-2:00pm.
							Clothing is also distributed at this location. Call for more information. Phone: 925-522-2017 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Grace Temple COGIC (Drive-Thru), 1001 Fitzuren Rd, Antioch , Tuesday & Friday 12:00-1:00pm. Phone: 925-759-8049 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Kings Chapel (Drive-Thru), 320 Worrell Rd, Antioch , 1st Friday by appointment only.
							Please call and verify your attendance at least 15 minutes before. Phone: 925-756-7315 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Light Ministries Pantry , 415 W 6th St, Antioch , Saturday 11:00am-12:00pm.
							By appointment only. Call to schedule. Phone: 925-778-1639 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Rivertown Veterans Thrift Store & Resource Center , 3646 Lone Tree Way, Antioch , Monday, Wednesday, Thursday & Friday 11:00am-3:30pm
Saturday 11:30am-3pm. Phone: 925-206-4976 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Showers of Blessings , 2220 A St, Antioch , Monday, Wednesday & Friday 6-7:30pm. Phone: 510-736-8477 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Support Life Foundation: Antioch (Drive-Thru), 2001 W 10th St, Antioch , Friday 11:00am-12:00pm.
							Clients must register before attending distribution. Please copy & paste this link into your search bar: https://supportlives.org/get-yana Phone: 510-541-6293 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. The Landing Place (Drive-Thru), 620 E Tregallas Rd, Antioch , Wednesday 10:00-11:00am. Phone: 925-513-5180 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. The Most Holy Rosary Church (SVdP) , 21 E 15th St, Antioch , Tuesday-Thursday 9:00-10:00am.
							Proof of address is Required. Bring ID for proof. Phone: 925-757-0941 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Visions Christian Center , 330 Worrell Rd, Antioch , Thursday 11:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 925-777-0290 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Partner Soup Kitchen Soup kitchens provide FREE meals to anyone who comes in during meal hours. Menus vary, although each soup kitchen tries to offer balanced meals. Loaves and Fishes (Veteran’s Memorial Building) , 403 W 6th St, Antioch , Monday-Friday 11:00am-12:45pm. Phone: 925-293-4792 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Antioch Senior Center , 415 W 2nd St, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Wednesday 9:00-10:00am. First Family Church , 3195 Contra Loma Blvd, Antioch , 1st & 3rd Wednesday 9:00-10:00am.
							The church is located behind the Summerset Apartment Complex. Be advised, there is a steep driveway to enter. There is also an alternative route through Longview Rd. Templo Santo Community Church , 201 E 18th St, Antioch , 2nd & 4th Thursday 10:00-11:00am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
Fairfield, CA 94533 GET HELP Find Food CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Contact Us 855-309-FOOD (3663) info@foodbankccs.org How to Help Ways to Give Donate Food Volunteer Advocate Become a Partner Agency Food Bank Updates Blog Events Newsroom Newsletter Sign-up Careers Facebook Twitter Youtube Instagram Linkedin 501(c)(3) Organization | Federal Tax ID# 94-2418054 Copyright © 2025 Cookie Settings This institution is an equal opportunity provider | Site Map | Privacy Policy Website Design and Development by MIGHTYminnow", "latitude": 37.9698744, "longitude": -121.7848131, "source": "food_bank_of_contra_costa_and_solano_ca", "food_bank": "Food Bank of Contra Costa and Solano"}
